mapper.insert: insert into contents_tb (contents_id, contents_title, contents_body, contents_type, contents_path) values (#{contentsId}, #{title}, #{body}, #{type}, #{path})
mapper.select: select contents_id contentsId, contents_title title, contents_body body, contents_type type, contents_path path from contents_tb where contents_id=#{contentsId}
